case_title: UNITED STATES OF AMERICA v. BLACK
case_info_full_case_name: UNITED STATES OF AMERICA v. BLACK

charges.charge_description: 18 USC 922(g)(1) - UNLAWFUL TRANSPORT AND POSSESSION OF FIREARMS BY A CONVICTED FELON(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Imprisonment of 57 months, 3 years supervised release. (2/18/2016 REVOCATION OF SUPERVISED RELEASE - 24 months imprisonment to be served concurrently to the term of imprisonment imposed in Case No. 3:14-CR-56-001.)

judges.judge_name: US MAGISTRATE JUDGE CHARLES H WEIGLE
